name: Mini Golf 64
description:
A mini golf game made for the LOWREZJAM 2019 !

/!\ No Sounds for now but imagine it's these one if needed :3

Controls:

  • Aim with Mouse or Joystick
  • Charge by pressing Left-click or ( A )
  • Launch by releasing Left-click or ( A )
  • Restart the level with R or ( Back )
  • Enable CRT-mode with C or ( Y )

Credits:

  • Game by Le6barbare
  • Minigolf assets by Kenney.
  • Pixel Art Fonts by Dadako
  • Scanline Shader by aaaleee
